com.turnout.ws.controller

Class RewardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.RewardController

  • @RestController
@Singleton
@Path(value="/")
public class RewardController
extends java.lang.Object
    RewardController class is front face for accessing and manipulating reward related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. Basic CRUD operation is done like update, retrieve, search and redeeming reward points.

      An injectable constructor with dependencies as argument.

    • Method Detail

      • reedemReward

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@POST
@Path(value="/validateVoucher")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject reedemReward(org.json.simple.JSONObject redemReq)
                                        throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                               NoSufficientGainedPointsException
        This method used to validate the voucher code.
        Parameters:
        redemReq - A JSONOject contains information of redeem.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of success message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - It throws when alphanumeric converted to numeric value.
        NoSufficientGainedPointsException - It throws when there is no sufficient gained point while redeeming reward.

      • rewardListing

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/rewardListing/{pageno}/{pagesize}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray rewardListing(@PathParam(value="pageno")
                                                                     int pageno,
                                                                     @PathParam(value="pagesize")
                                                                     int pagesize)
        This method used to get all reward listing from database.
        Parameters:
        pageno - A integer value for which page record to display.
        pagesize - A integer value to show how many records need to display.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the reward listing.

      • getRewardDetailById

        @RolesAllowed(value={"ADMIN","USER"})
@GET
@Path(value="/rewardDetails/rewardid/{rewardid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getRewardDetailById(@PathParam(value="rewardid")
                                                                            int rewardid)
                                               throws RewardNotFoundException
        This method used to get reward detail from database based on reward id passed.
        Parameters:
        rewardid - A primary key of reward element.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject which contains whole details of reward element.
        Throws:
        RewardNotFoundException

      • saveReward

        @POST
@Path(value="/saveReward")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject saveReward(org.json.simple.JSONObject rwdReq)
                                      throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                             java.text.ParseException
        This method used to save a reward details into database.It will return a reward id of just inserted or updated reward
        Parameters:
        rwdReq - A JSONOject contains information of rewards.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of reward id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Exception thrown when the application has attempted to convert a string to one of the numeric types, but that the string does not have the appropriate format.
        java.text.ParseException - Exception thrown when we try to parsing.

      • rewardSearch

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@GET
@Path(value="/rewardSearch/rwdname/{rwdname}/stdid/{stdid}/type/{rwdtype}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray rewardSearch(@PathParam(value="rwdname")
                                                                    java.lang.String rwdname,
                                                                    @PathParam(value="stdid")
                                                                    int stdid,
                                                                    @PathParam(value="rwdtype")
                                                                    java.lang.String type)
        This method used to get all the rewards from database and helps to search the rewards based on reward name, studio id, welcome / exist notification type.
        Parameters:
        rwdname - A string holds a text that has to be searched.
        stdid - A integer value holds studio id has to be searched.
        type -
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.
